ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Plane tactics for bards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... well, i was too busy/lazy to comment/read that thread but i probly would have said something along the lines that there is always going to be a situation
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:22 AM 6/28/00 +1000, you wrote:
> so given all these things, what are you left with? if you happen to end
>up in a tank group
> (you will almost never be put in the pull group due to bard song random
>aggro bugs) then
> you could play level 1 song and heal and damage shield if you really
>wanted to, but i would
> suggest parking yourself next to the cleric and singing mana song while
>swinging weapons.
> if you are in a caster group then there is not much point to singing
>anything but mana song,
> heh.
>
>
> - Now I find this funny. You recomend that as a bard use weapons. And
>yet just yesterday someone went on about how the "battle bard" is not a
>great idea.... *HURM*

well, i was too busy/lazy to comment/read that thread but i probly would have said
something along the lines that there is always going to be a situation where one
strategy or another is better to use. battle bard has it's place, as does chant bard,
heal bard, charm bard, etc. this is one of those situations where battle bard is
going to be almost the only option available to you.
